keys: der die Funktion Zeile des rechten Winkels

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Den räta linjens funktion</string>
            <string language="en">The right angle line's function</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der die Funktion Zeile des rechten Winkels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La fonction de la ligne d'angle droit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A função da linha do ângulo direito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La funzione della riga di angolo retto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η λειτουργία της σωστής γραμμής γωνίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La función de la línea del angulo recto</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Nu vidgar vi resonemanget och tittar även på räta linjer som ej går genom origo. Vi har då en linjär funktion och vi ska studera några sådana.
Modul 6 - Funktioner.
Matematik A.</string>
            <string language="en">Now, we extend the argument and looks also on right angle lines that do not go through origo. We have then a linear function and we will study some like that.
Module 6 - functions.
Mathematics A.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Matematik A</string>
            <string language="sv">funktioner</string>
            <string language="sv">rät linje</string>
            <string language="sv">den räta linjens funktion</string>
            <string language="sv">linjär funktion</string>
            <string language="sv">origo</string>
            <string language="sv">proportionalitetskonstant</string>
            <string language="en">Mathematics A</string>
            <string language="en">functions</string>
            <string language="en">right angle line</string>
            <string language="en">the right angle line's function</string>
            <string language="en">linear function</string>
            <string language="en">origo</string>
            <string language="en">proportionalitetskonstant</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jetzt dehnen wir das Argument und die Blicke auch
auf Zeilen des rechten Winkels aus, die nicht origo durchlaufen. 
Wir haben dann eine lineare Funktion und wir studieren einiges 
wie that.Module 6 - functions.Mathematics A.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maintenant, nous étendons l'argument et les 
regards également sur les lignes d'angle droit qui ne passent pas par
l'origo. Nous avons alors une fonction linéaire et nous en 
étudierons comme that.Module 6 - functions.Mathematics A.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Agora, nós estendemos o argumento e os olhares 
também nas linhas do ângulo direito que não atravessam o origo. 
Nós temos então uma função linear e nós estudaremos algum 
como that.Module 6 - functions.Mathematics A.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ora, estendiamo l'argomento e gli sguardi 
egualmente sulle righe di angolo retto che non passano con il origo. 
Abbiamo allora una funzione lineare e studeremo alcuno come 
that.Module 6 - functions.Mathematics A.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τώρα, επεκτείνουμε το όρισμα και κοιτάζουμε επίσης 
στις γραμμές σωστής γωνίας που δεν περνούν από το origo. 
Έχουμε έπειτα μια γραμμική λειτουργία και θα μελετήσουμε 
μερικοί όπως εκείνη την ενότητα 6 - μαθηματικά Α λειτουργιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ahora, ampliamos el argumento y las miradas 
también en las líneas del angulo recto que no pasan con origo. 
Tenemos entonces una función linear y estudiaremos alguno como 
that.Module 6 - functions.Mathematics A.</string>
          </description>
